pages.text: $(item)Hydration Packs$() are $(water)Purified Water$() containers that can be equipped as a Body bauble.$(br2)While $(item)Hydration Packs$() boast a larger fluid capacity and better thirst efficiency than $(item)Canteens$(), they cannot be drank from directly and instead must be equipped to receive the hydration effect.$(br2)While worn, $(item)Hydration Packs$()

will automatically hydrate the player whenever they reach a configured thirst threshold.$(br2)Hydration packs also have the ability to be attached directly to chest armor, providing the same effect as though they were equipped as a bauble.
